channel.title: Posts on Yutong LIU's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yutong LIU's Blog

item.title: Cancun Trip
item.description: 携带物品: 护照I20，现金(美元和比索)，防晒，拖鞋，相机电脑耳机，驱蚊，衣物(六天时间，气温20-28，记得泳裤和帽子) 行程事项: 12.2

item.title: Joke Generator
item.description: The blog is based on the project of joke generator, which aims to produce a certain joke related to the topic words we provide for the network. Basic idea is inspired by the neural machine translation, which can translate a sequence to another with a different length. My model is optimized from the previous neural network, which considers topic words as the input language and convert them into a joke style sentence.

item.title: End_of_term
item.description: 没什么好说的，学期默默结束了，但是没有可享受的假期。

item.title: Fisrt_blog
item.description: Hope every thing goes well, especially for job searching. Good Luck!
